title: 97/282/EC: Commission Decision of 28 April 1997 amending Decision 97/116/EC concerning certain protection measures relating to classical swine fever in Germany (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 April 1997 amending Decision 97/116/EC concerning certain protection measures relating to classical swine fever in Germany (Text with EEA relevance) (97/282/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I and II to Decision 97/116/EC are replaced by Annexes I and II respectively to this Decision.
The Member States shall amend the measures they apply to trade so as to bring them into compliance with this Decision. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 April 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
